introduction: SYNOPSISReporter Ja-kyung is a wildly liberated individual who wears a facade of chastity. She copes with her desires by fantasies of having affairs with men she finds attractive. Just about the time, she is assigned to do a story on Male Sex Appeal, her friend Min-ji arrives from the United States to have a good time in Seoul. Min-ji comes along to help her cover the story and the two get into their share of trouble. Ja-kyung, becoming burdened by her virginity, meets Dong-hyuk, the man of her dreams. With the help of Min-ji, Ja-kyung goes through an incredible transformation.故事Reuppo作家私刑是自由奔放，但似乎是管理一个纯洁形象的双重性质所有者。维吉兰特有他自己的幻想，以减轻通过一个男人和一个华而不实的事李Sanghyeong've做出自己的想象力热欲望。各地治安维持在伊朗reuppo“一个男人的性感”委托暂时返回来享受的朋友敏吉在美国。敏吉已经发生和将发生的同时配以覆盖，两个人都会有不同的颜色每jeulgeoeum羊毛。维吉兰特为他辩护寻找一个合作伙伴自由自己的性满足的给出donghyeok他的梦想李Sanghyeong是尝试丰富多彩的改造与敏吉的帮助下童贞的责任。
